Posts.Content: whatever you choose, my surgeon warned me that I'd have a 70% chance of the breast getting hard because of the previous cancer surgury and encapsulation. I was very disturbed by this, and don't know what to do. I have one silicone implant in one breast and the implant was removed from my cancer breast to now I'm lopsided. He told me that he has seen some really really HARD breasts - not a happy thought. .
Posts.Title: saline vs. silicone implants--advice needed
